collection: **Data Collection:** No personal information is actively gathered from GPT.

Interaction data, such as selected text, generated interactions, and content
created through the Hrefgo.com platform, is collected purely to process user
inquiries and to improve service performance.
sharing:
## Data Sharing

**Processing Requests:** When GPT initiate requests to Hrefgo servers, these
may be forwarded to OpenAI, Microsoft, or subsequent AI service providers.

Data sharing is confined to the content provided by the GPT, ChatGPT, and
their generated queries.
